Founded in 2010, Luxury has been providi: Founded in 2010, Luxury has been providing exceptional accommodation experiences for travelers from around the world. What started as a small hostel has grown into a beloved destination for backpackers, students, and budget-conscious travelers.

Meet fellow travelers in our common area: Meet fellow travelers in our common areas, join organized activities, and make new friends from around the world.
Our properties are cleaned daily and equ: Our properties are cleaned daily and equipped with comfortable beds, fresh linens, and all the essentials you need.

What time is check-in and check-out?: What time is check-in and check-out?
Check-in is from 2:00 PM to 10:00 PM, an: Check-in is from 2:00 PM to 10:00 PM, and check-out is at 11:00 AM. If you need to arrive earlier or later, please contact us in advance and we'll do our best to accommodate you.
Do you provide towels and linens?: Do you provide towels and linens?
Yes, we provide fresh towels and linens: Yes, we provide fresh towels and linens for all guests. Towels are changed daily, and linens are changed every 3 days for longer stays.
We offer a complimentary continental bre: We offer a complimentary continental breakfast from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM daily. This includes coffee, tea, bread, jam, and seasonal fruits.
Yes, you can cancel your booking up to 2: Yes, you can cancel your booking up to 24 hours before check-in for a full refund. Cancellations within 24 hours may be subject to a cancellation fee.
We have limited parking spaces available: We have limited parking spaces available on a first-come, first-served basis. There's also public parking nearby. Please contact us in advance if you need parking.

This Refund Policy explains the conditio: This Refund Policy explains the conditions under which refunds may be issued for bookings made through our student housing rental platform.
By making a booking, you agree to this R: By making a booking, you agree to this Refund Policy. We encourage you to review these terms before completing your reservation.

In cases of natural disasters, pandemics: In cases of natural disasters, pandemics, or government restrictions, refunds may be adjusted according to applicable laws and our discretion.
